profile.manageInfo: Manage your personal, company and billing information

hero.title: Create Smarter Surveys & Assessments
hero.subtitle: Build professional surveys, assessments, and quizzes with our intuitive platform. Get insights that matter with advanced analytics and reporting.

feature1.title: Smart Survey Builder
feature1.description: Create professional surveys with our intuitive drag-and-drop builder. Multiple question types, logic branching, and real-time preview.

feature2.title: Advanced Analytics
feature2.description: Get deep insights with comprehensive analytics, data visualization, and automated reporting features.

feature3.title: Team Collaboration
feature3.description: Work together seamlessly with team sharing, real-time collaboration, and permission management.

feature4.title: Custom Branding
feature4.description: Brand your surveys with custom logos, colors, and themes to match your organization's identity.

feature5.title: Multi-Platform Access
feature5.description: Access your surveys anywhere with responsive design that works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

feature6.title: Data Security
feature6.description: Enterprise-grade security with data encryption, GDPR compliance, and secure data storage.

education.title: Education
education.description: Create quizzes, exams, and course evaluations

hrTeams.title: HR Teams
hrTeams.description: Employee satisfaction surveys and performance evaluations

startups.title: Startups
startups.description: Product-market fit and customer validation surveys

universities.title: Universities
universities.description: Student feedback and academic research surveys

testimonial1.quote: SigmaQ has transformed how we collect feedback. The analytics are incredible and the platform is so easy to use.

testimonial2.quote: We've increased our response rates by 40% since switching to SigmaQ. The mobile experience is fantastic.

testimonial3.quote: The custom branding features helped us maintain our brand identity while collecting valuable customer insights.
